trait.text: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 206

trait.name: Shapechanger
trait.text: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
trait.text: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Poison’s Disciple (2/Day)
trait.text: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target.

trait.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Farm Only)
trait.text: The yuan-ti is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast (range 300 ft., +3 bonus to each damage roll), friends, guidance, mage hand, message, poison spray
• 1st-3rd level (2 3rd-level slots): command, counterspell, hellish rebuke, invisibility, misty step, unseen servant, vampiric touch

trait.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
trait.text: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
trait.text: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
action.text: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Merrshaulk's Slumber (1/Day)
action.text: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.
Unconscious:
• An unconscious creature is incapacitated, meaning it can't take actions or reactions, can't move or speak, and is unaware of its surroundings.
• The creature drops whatever it's holding and falls prone.
• The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
• Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
• Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature.

monster.spells: animal friendship, suggestion, eldritch blast, friends, guidance, mage hand, message, poison spray, command, counterspell, hellish rebuke, invisibility, misty step, unseen servant, vampiric touch

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 203

trait.name: Fear Frenzy
trait.text: The horror has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

action.name: Frightening Screech (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The horror screeches. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the horror's Frightening Screech for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 205

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
trait.text: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Stride
trait.text: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Lashing Shadows (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 205

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Maddening Presence
action.text: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 192

trait.name: Eye of the Law
trait.text: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: calm emotions, command, compelled duel

trait.name: Mount
trait.text: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

action.name: Hammer of Justice
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Pacifying Presence
action.text: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: The archon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The archon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Rejoin Mount
legendary.text: If the archon isn't mounted, it magically teleports to its steed and mounts it as long as the archon and its steed are on the same plane of existence.

legendary.name: Smite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The archon makes a Hammer of Justice attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Detention (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: The archon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or be magically teleported to a harmless demiplane until the end of the archon's next turn, whereupon the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

monster.spells: calm emotions, command, compelled duel

monster.name: Battleforce Angel
monster.resist: fire, radiant

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 189

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

action.name: Battlefield Inspiration
action.text: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

monster.name: Deathpact Angel
monster.resist: necrotic, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 191

trait.name: Exploitation of the Debtors
trait.text: As a bonus action, the angel targets a creature charmed by it that it can see within 30 feet of it. The angel deals 11 (2d10) necrotic damage to the target, and the angel gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The angel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: command (as a 2nd-level spell), detect evil and good
1/day: raise dead
3/day each: charm person (as a 5th-level spell), darkness, suggestion

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The angel makes two attacks with its scythe. It can substitute Chains of Obligation for one of these attacks.

action.name: Scythe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Chains of Obligation
action.text: The angel targets one creature charmed by it that it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Charisma saving throw or become paralyzed for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

monster.spells: command, detect evil and good, raise dead, charm person, darkness, suggestion

monster.name: Felidar
monster.languages: understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 199

trait.name: Bonding
trait.text: The felidar can magically bond with one creature it can see, right after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the felidar bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. This bond has the following effects: The felidar and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet. The felidar can sense the direction and distance to the bonded creature if they're on the same plane of existence. As an action, the felidar or the bonded creature can sense what the other sees and hears, during which time it loses its own sight and hearing. This effect lasts until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The felidar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the felidar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the felidar can make one claw attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The felidar makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Variant: Winged Felidars
action.text: Some felidars boast huge, feathered wings. A winged felidar uses the same stat block as an ordinary felidar, with the addition of a flying speed of 40 feet.

monster.name: Firemane Angel
monster.resist: fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 190

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The angel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
3/day each: compelled duel, guiding bolt (as a 5th-level spell)
1/day each: daylight, fireball (as a 6th-level spell)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: If the angel takes 21 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The angel makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) fire or radiant damage (angel's choice).

monster.spells: compelled duel, guiding bolt, daylight, fireball

monster.name: Aurelia
monster.resist: necrotic, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 230

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Leadership
action.text: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

action.name: Warleader's Helix (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +17 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Aurelia adds 7 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Aurelia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Unyielding
reaction.text: When Aurelia is subjected to an effect that would move her, knock her prone, or both, she can use her reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Aurelia can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Aurelia regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Command Allies
legendary.text: Aurelia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. If a chosen creature can see or hear Aurelia, it can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Longsword Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Aurelia makes one longsword attack.

legendary.name: Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Aurelia targets up to five creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 25 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the end of her next turn. Any target within 5 feet of Aurelia has disadvantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 221

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
reaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 221

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
reaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

monster.name: Niv-Mizzet
monster.resist: cold, psychic, thunder

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 241

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Locus of the Firemind
trait.text: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master Chemister
trait.text: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 26, +18 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, unseen servant
• 2nd level (3 slots): blur, enlarge/reduce, flaming sphere, scorching ray
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, hold person, lightning bolt, slow
• 4th level (3 slots): confusion, dimension door, fabricate
• 5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, polymorph, wall of fire, wall of force
• 6th level (1 slots): chain lightning, disintegrate, true seeing
• 7th level (1 slots): project image, reverse gravity, teleport
• 8th level (1 slots): control weather, maze, power word stun
• 9th level (1 slots): prismatic wall

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (4/Turn)
legendary.text: Niv-Mizzet can take 4 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Niv-Mizzet regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cantrip
legendary.text: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
legendary.text: Niv-Mizzet makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

monster.spells: fire bolt, light, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp, detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, unseen servant, blur, enlarge/reduce, flaming sphere, scorching ray, counterspell, fireball, hold person, lightning bolt, slow, confusion, dimension door, fabricate, conjure elemental, polymorph, wall of fire, wall of force, chain lightning, disintegrate, true seeing, project image, reverse gravity, teleport, control weather, maze, power word stun, prismatic wall

monster.name: Arclight Phoenix
monster.resist: thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 193

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Grounded Lightning
trait.text: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Lightning Form
trait.text: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

trait.name: Crackling Death
trait.text: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

action.name: Arclight Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

monster.name: Blistercoil Weird
monster.resist: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 207

trait.name: Feed on Fire
trait.text: If the weird takes fire damage from a spell or other magical effect, its size increases by one category. If there isn't enough room for the weird to increase in size, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. While the weird is Large or bigger, it makes Strength checks and saving throws with advantage. If the weird starts its turn at Gargantuan size, the weird releases energy in an explosion. Each creature within 30 feet of the weird must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. The weird's size then becomes Medium.

trait.name: Form of Fire and Water
trait.text: The weird can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the weird can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the weird enters another creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Heated Body
trait.text: A creature that touches the weird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The weird sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage if the weird is Large or bigger.

monster.name: Fluxcharger
monster.resist: thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 208

trait.name: Amplify Lightning
trait.text: Whenever a spell that deals lightning damage includes one or more fluxchargers in its area, the spell deals an extra 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The fluxcharger makes two slam attacks or uses Arc Lightning twice.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

action.name: Arc Lightning
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the fluxcharger's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) lightning damage. Hit or Miss: The fluxcharger takes 5 (1d10) force damage after resolving the attack.

monster.name: Galvanice Weird
monster.resist: cold, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 209

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the galvanice weird dies, it explodes in a burst of ice and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding weird must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or lose the ability to use reactions until the start of the weird's next turn.

monster.name: Conclave Dryad

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 194

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: druidcraft
3/day each: dispel magic, entangle, plant growth, spike growth
1/day each: moonbeam, grasping vine, wall of thorns

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the dryad shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dryad makes three attacks, using its vine staff, its longbow, or both.

action.name: Vine Staff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained by twisting vines for 1 minute. A target restrained in this way can use an action to make a DC 17 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Summon Mount (1/Day)
action.text: The dryad magically summons a mount, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the dryad. The mount remains for 8 hours, until it or the dryad dies, or until the dryad dismisses it as an action. The mount uses the stat block of an elk (see the Monster Manual) with these changes: it is a plant instead of a beast, it has an Intelligence of 6, and it understands Sylvan but can't speak. While within 1 mile of the mount, the dryad can communicate with it telepathically.

action.name: Suppress Magic (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dryad targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the dryad is incapacitated or dies, or until the dryad uses a bonus action to end the effect.

monster.spells: druidcraft, dispel magic, entangle, plant growth, spike growth, moonbeam, grasping vine, wall of thorns

monster.name: Trostani

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 252

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Trostani's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 24). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dispel magic, druidcraft
3/day each: bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion
1/day each: conjure fey, mass cure wounds

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
trait.text: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

action.name: Touch of Order
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

action.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (5/Turn)
legendary.text: Trostani can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Trostani regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Voice of Harmony
legendary.text: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Voice of Life
legendary.text: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary.name: Voice of Order
legendary.text: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

monster.spells: dispel magic, druidcraft, bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion, conjure fey, mass cure wounds

monster.name: Cackler
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 195

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The cackler's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The cackler can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: fire bolt
1/day: Tasha's hideous laughter

trait.name: Last Laugh
trait.text: When the cackler dies, it releases a dying laugh that scars the minds of other nearby creatures. Each creature within 10 feet of the cackler must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The cackler can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 11 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Spiked Chain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.spells: fire bolt, Tasha's hideous laughter

monster.name: Master of Cruelties
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 196

trait.name: Aura of Blood Lust
trait.text: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

trait.name: Feed on the Crowd
trait.text: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The master's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The master can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person (as a 3rd-level spell), crown of madness
1/day: dominate person

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

action.name: Captivating Presence (Recharge 6)
action.text: Each creature within 120 feet of the master must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the master for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the charmed creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

monster.spells: charm person, crown of madness, dominate person

monster.name: Rakdos
monster.resist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 247

trait.name: Captivating Presence
trait.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a DC 25 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Cruel Entertainment
trait.text: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 25). He can innately cast hellish rebuke (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.
At will: hellish rebuke

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

action.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Rakdos can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Rakdos regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Sadistic Revelry
legendary.text: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is charmed by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary.name: Scythe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary.name: Touch of Pain (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't maintain concentration on a spell or any other effect that requires concentration. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.spells: hellish rebuke

monster.name: Sire of Insanity
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 197

trait.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
trait.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The sire's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The sire can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: clairvoyance, crown of madness, major image, suggestion
1/day each: confusion, mass suggestion

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

monster.spells: clairvoyance, crown of madness, major image, suggestion, confusion, mass suggestion

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 200

action.name: Chain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Furious Defense
reaction.text: After a creature the giant can see is dealt damage by a foe within 20 feet of the giant, the giant makes a chain attack against that foe.

monster.name: Borborygmos
monster.resist: poison, psychic

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 238

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Borborygmos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
trait.text: Borborygmos has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: Borborygmos deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Borborygmos can use his Frightful Presence. He also makes two attacks: one with his maul and one with his stomp.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Stomp
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
action.text: Each creature of Borborygmos's choice that is within 60 feet of him and can see or hear him must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Borborygmos can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Borborygmos regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: Borborygmos makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Bellow (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Borborygmos yells menacingly at one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. That creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. If the creature is already frightened, it becomes stunned instead. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Bellow for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wide Berth (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Borborygmos moves up to half his speed and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time Borborygmos enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. If the saving throw succeeds, the creature is pushed 5 feet away from Borborygmos. If the saving throw fails, that creature is knocked prone, and Borborygmos can make a stomp attack against it.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 201

trait.name: Vigilant
trait.text: The giant can't be surprised.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes three spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage, or 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: When an attacker the giant can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 10 feet of the giant, the giant can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Nivix Cyclops
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 216

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Spell Vitalization
reaction.text: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 202

trait.name: Focus
trait.text: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a d4 to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a d4 from its attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 202

trait.name: Reckless
trait.text: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
trait.text: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 (4d8) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 217

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The hybrid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hybrid makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monster.name: Hybrid Flier
monster.resist: acid

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 217

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Acid
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 217

trait.name: Assassinate
trait.text: During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
trait.text: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Toxic Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 218

trait.name: Electrified Body
trait.text: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.

action.name: Shocking Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. The target is grappled (escape DC 11), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 218

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
trait.text: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Biomancer

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 256

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
trait.text: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy
• 4th level (3 slots): confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph
• 5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster
• 6th level (1 slots): move earth, wall of ice
• 7th level (1 slots): prismatic spray
• 8th level (1 slots): control weather

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monster.spells: acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp, detect magic, grease, shield, alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person, counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy, confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph, cone of cold, creation, hold monster, move earth, wall of ice, prismatic spray, control weather

monster.name: Blood Witch
monster.languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)
monster.resist: psychic

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 248

trait.name: Blood Witch Dance
trait.text: The witch can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by its hex spell that it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of the witch's choice.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
trait.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the witch's darkvision.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The witch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The witch can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self, detect magic, eldritch blast (at 11th level), false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only)
1/day each: circle of death, enthrall, suggestion
3/day each: hellish rebuke, hex, scorching ray (at 3rd level)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The witch makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its shortsword.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.spells: alter self, detect magic, eldritch blast, false life, levitate, mage armor, circle of death, enthrall, suggestion, hellish rebuke, hex, scorching ray

monster.name: Cosmotronic Blastseeker

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 242

trait.name: Empowered Spell (3/Day)
trait.text: When the blastseeker rolls damage for a spell, it can reroll up to four dice of damage. It must use the new dice.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:
2/day: fireball
3/day each: scorching ray, shield, thunderwave

trait.name: Tides of Chaos (1/Day)
trait.text: The blastseeker makes one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage.

action.name: Warhammer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.spells: fireball, scorching ray, shield, thunderwave

monster.name: Counterflux Blastseeker

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 242

trait.name: Counterflux Overcast (Recharge 5-6)
trait.text: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a d6 to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius invisible sphere centered on itself that lasts until the end of its next turn. Creatures in the sphere have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. 4-6. The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius invisible sphere centered on itself that lasts until the end of its next turn. Creatures in the sphere have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Explosive Tank
trait.text: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

action.name: Light Hammer
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Scorchbringer (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Feed on Death
trait.text: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Hive Mind
trait.text: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The kraul's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kraul can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chill touch, poison spray
3/day each: ray of enfeeblement, ray of sickness
1/day each: animate dead, blight, vampiric touch

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Hive Mind
trait.text: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Spider Climb

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Variant: Winged Kraul Warriors
action.text: Some kraul warriors have a flying speed of 40 feet, as a result of possessing gossamer wings. Their wings give them a higher station among the kraul soldiers. Winged kraul warriors serve the guild as scouts and shock troops.

monster.name: Zegana
monster.resist: cold, poison

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 255

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Zegana can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Zegana is a 15th-level Simic spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, druidcraft, ray of frost, shape water
• 1st level (4 slots): color spray, expeditious retreat, fog cloud, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): enlarge/reduce, gust of wind
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, slow
• 4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm, polymorph
• 5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, creation
• 6th level (1 slots): move earth, wall of ice
• 7th level (1 slots): prismatic spray, teleport
• 8th level (1 slots): control weather, dominate monster

action.name: Prime Speaker's Trident
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 (3d8). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: Deluge (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Zegana can take 4 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Zegana regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Adaptive Skin
legendary.text: Zegana gains resistance to one damage type of her choice-acid, fire, lightning, or thunder-until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Trident
legendary.text: Zegana makes one melee attack with the Prime Speaker's Trident.

legendary.name: Enlarge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Zegana casts enlarge/reduce on herself, using the enlarge option, without expending a spell slot.

legendary.name: Deluge (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Zegana uses Deluge, if available.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 212

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The krasis can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (6d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monster.name: Isperia
monster.immune: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 227

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Isperia's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 23). Isperia can innately cast imprisonment twice per day, requiring no material components.
2/day: imprisonment

trait.name: Inscrutable
trait.text: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Isperia is a 15th-level Azorius spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 23, +14 to hit with spell attacks). Isperia has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, detect evil and good, ensnaring strike, sanctuary, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, augury, calm emotions, hold person, silence, zone of truth
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance, counterspell, dispel magic, tongues
• 4th level (3 slots): divination, locate creature
• 5th level (2 slots): dispel evil and good, scrying
• 6th level (1 slots): word of recall
• 7th level (1 slots): divine word
• 8th level (1 slots): antimagic field

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

action.name: Supreme Legal Authority
action.text: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful DC 23 Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Isperia can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Isperia regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
legendary.text: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

monster.spells: imprisonment, guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, command, detect evil and good, ensnaring strike, sanctuary, shield of faith, arcane lock, augury, calm emotions, hold person, silence, zone of truth, bestow curse, clairvoyance, counterspell, dispel magic, tongues, divination, locate creature, dispel evil and good, scrying, word of recall, divine word, antimagic field

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 219

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 220

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The skyswimmer can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Undercity Medusa

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 222

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The medusa's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14). The medusa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: expeditious retreat, fog cloud, misty step

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
trait.text: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Petrifying Gaze
action.text: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

monster.spells: expeditious retreat, fog cloud, misty step

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 225

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The wurm deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Earth Tremors
trait.text: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
trait.text: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (5d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 (5d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monster.name: Lazav
monster.resist: necrotic, psychic

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 232

trait.name: Elusive
trait.text: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is incapacitated.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Lazav's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect thoughts, encode thoughts (see chapter 2), freedom of movement, vicious mockery (4d4 psychic damage)
3/day each: blur, confusion, mirror image
1/day each: modify memory, Rary's telepathic bond

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Shapechanger Savant
trait.text: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Psychic Defenses
trait.text: Unless Lazav is incapacitated, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Lazav can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Lazav regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: Lazav makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Lazav casts one of his innate spells.

legendary.name: Shifting Nightmare (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Lazav rapidly takes the form of several nightmarish creatures, lashing out at all nearby. Each creature within 10 feet of Lazav must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by Lazav: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic.

monster.spells: detect thoughts, encode thoughts, freedom of movement, vicious mockery, blur, confusion, mirror image, modify memory, Rary's telepathic bond

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 239

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Spiked Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Blood Drinker Vampire
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life
monster.resist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 223

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount.
