trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 197

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The Stonemelder is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, blade ward, light, mending, mold earth
• 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, false life, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): Maximilian's earthen grasp, shatter
• 3rd level (3 slots): erupting earth, meld into stone
• 4th level (1 slot): stoneskin

action.name: Black Earth Rod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional 1d8 for each level of the slot above 1st.

monster.spells: acid splash, blade ward, light, mending, mold earth, expeditious retreat, false life, shield, Maximilian's earthen grasp, shatter, erupting earth, meld into stone, stoneskin

monster.name: Thurl Merosska

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 192

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Thurl is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Thurl knows the following sorcerer spells:
Cantrips (at will): friends, gust, light, message, ray of frost
• 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump
• 2nd level (3 slots): levitate, misty step
• 3rd level (2 slots): haste

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Thurl makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

action.name: Lance
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12+3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.spells: friends, gust, light, message, ray of frost, expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, levitate, misty step, haste

monster.name: Vanifer

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 203

trait.name: Funeral Pyre
trait.text: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
trait.text: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Vanifer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Vanifer knows the following sorcerer spells:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, hypnotic pattern
• 4th level (3 slots): wall of fire
• 5th level (2 slots): dominate person

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Vanifer makes two attacks.

action.name: Tinderstrike
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4+5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

monster.spells: chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy, burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield, darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray, counterspell, fireball, hypnotic pattern, wall of fire, dominate person

monster.name: Wiggan Nettlebee

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 211

trait.name: Brave Devotion
trait.text: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Wiggan is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, shillelagh, thaumaturgy
• 1st Level (4 slots): animal friendship, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, speak with animals
• 2nd Level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth, spiritual weapon

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

action.name: Wooden Cane
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 — 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

monster.spells: guidance, light, mending, shillelagh, thaumaturgy, animal friendship, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, speak with animals, barkskin, spike growth, spiritual weapon

monster.name: Windharrow

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 192

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Windharrow is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Windharrow knows the following bard spells:
Cantrips (at will): friends, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
• 1st level (4 slots): disguise self, dissonant whispers, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, shatter, silence
• 3rd level (3 slots): nondetection, sending, tongues
• 4th level (2 slots): confusion, dimension door

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Windharrow makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Rapier
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

monster.spells: friends, prestidigitation, vicious mockery, disguise self, dissonant whispers, thunderwave, invisibility, shatter, silence, nondetection, sending, tongues, confusion, dimension door

monster.name: Yan-C-Bin
monster.resist: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Princes of the Apocalypse p. 220

trait.name: Air Form
trait.text: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
trait.text: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Yan-C-Bin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: gust of wind, invisibility, lightning bolt
2/day each: chain lightning, cloudkill, haste

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Yan-C-Bin makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8+7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Thundercrack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot- radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (9d6) thunder damage and be deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is deafened until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.
Deafened:
• A deafened creature can't hear and automatically fails any ability check that requires hearing.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
action.text: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three air elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Yan-C-Bin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Yan-C-Bin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Peal of Thunder
legendary.text: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a peal of thunder that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. Each creature within 30 feet of Yan-C-Bin takes 5 (1d10) thunder damage.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Yan-C-Bin magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Yan-C-Bin is wearing or carrying is teleported with him.

legendary.name: Suffocate (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Yan-C-Bin steals the air of one breathing creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target drops to 0 hit points and is dying. On a successful save, the target can't breathe or speak until the start of its next turn.

monster.spells: gust of wind, invisibility, lightning bolt, chain lightning, cloudkill, haste

monster.name: Augrek Brighthelm
monster.resist: poison

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 247

trait.name: Dwarvish Resilience
trait.text: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Sheriff's deputy Augrek guards the southwest gate of Bryn Shander and welcomes visitors to town. She has a good heart.
Ideal: "You'll get farther in life with a kind word than an axe."
Bond: "Bryn Shander is my home. It's my job to protect her."
Flaw: "I'm head over heels in love with Sheriff Southwell. One day I hope to marry him."

action.name: Warhammer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10+2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Augrek carries ten crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 249

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Beldora is a member of the Harpers who survives using her wits and wiles. She looks like a homeless waif, but she's a survivor who shies away from material wealth.
Ideal: "We should all strive to help one another."
Bond: "I'll risk my life to protect the powerless."
Flaw: "I like lying to people. Makes life more interesting, no?"

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Beldora carries ten crossbow bolts.

reaction.name: Duck and Cover
reaction.text: Beldora adds 2 to her AC against one ranged attack that would hit her. To do so, Beldora must see the attacker and can't be grappled or restrained.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 285, Storm King's Thunder p. 240

trait.name: Nondetection
trait.text: The cat can't be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spell Turning
trait.text: The cat has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the cat (not an area). If the cat's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the cat and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 253

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Darathra has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: As the Lord Protector of Triboar and a secret agent of the Harpers, Darathra has sworn an oath to defend the town. She takes her duty very seriously. In addition to her gear, Darathra has an unarmored warhorse named Buster.
Ideal: "Good people should be given every chance to prosper, free of tyranny."
Bond: "I'll lay down my life to protect Triboar and its citizens."
Flaw: "I refuse to back down. Push me, and I'll push back."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Darathra makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10) piercing damage. Darathra carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 253

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: Darz deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Darz that isn't incapacitated and Darz doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: In his youth, Darz was a member of the Xanathar Thieves' Guild in Waterdeep. After serving ten years in prison for his crimes, he cut all ties to the city and moved north to be a campground caretaker.
Ideal: "You can run from your past, but you can't hide from it."
Bond: "I've made a new life in Triboar. I'm not gonna run away this time."
Flaw: "I have no regrets. I do whatever it takes to survive."

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage. Darz carries twenty sling stones.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 248

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: The daughter of a Waterdhavian trader and a tavern server, Duvessa has her mother's talent for negotiation and her father's charm. As the first woman to serve as Town Speaker of Bryn Shander, and a young one at that, she has much to prove.
Ideal: "The people of Icewind Dale are survivors. They can weather any storm."
Bond: "My mother taught me what it means to be a good leader. I won't disappoint her."
Flaw: "I don't give an inch in any argument or conflict."

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Duvessa carries only one dagger.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Duvessa adds 2 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Duvessa must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Monster Manual p. 154

trait.name: Variant: Siege Monster
trait.text: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.
Storm King's Thunder p. 246

trait.name: Variant: Tackle
trait.text: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
Storm King's Thunder p. 245

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6+7) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10+7) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Ghelryn Foehammer
monster.resist: poison

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 255

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ghelryn has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Giant Slayer
trait.text: Any weapon attack that Ghelryn makes against a giant deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage on a hit .

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: The blacksmith Ghelryn has a good heart, but he hates orcs and giants — hates them with a fiery passion. He considers it the solemn duty of all dwarves to cave in their skulls!
Ideal: "It is incumbent upon every dwarf to forge a legacy."
Bond: "I stand for Clan Foehammer and all dwarvenkind."
Flaw: "I never run from a fight, especially if it involves killing orcs or giants."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Ghelryn makes two battleaxe attacks .

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 240

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Shell Camouflage
trait.text: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10+4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

monster.name: Iymrith (Giant Form)
monster.resist: cold

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 241

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Iymrith fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Iymrith can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Iymrith's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Iymrith makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Iymrith hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point she can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: Iymrith magically polymorphs into a female storm giant or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In storm giant form, Iymrith retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

monster.spells: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, control weather, water breathing

monster.name: Iymrith the Dragon

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 241

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If Iymrith fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Iymrith's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: counterspell, detect magic, ice storm, stone shape, teleport

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Iymrith can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10+9) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
action.text: Each creature of Iymrith's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Iymrith's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
Frightened:
• A frightened creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of its fear is within line of sight.
• The creature can't willingly move closer to the source of its fear.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Iymrith exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: Iymrith magically polymorphs into a female storm giant or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In storm giant form, Iymrith retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Iymrith can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Iymrith regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.text: Iymrith makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
legendary.text: Iymrith makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Iymrith beats its wings. Each creature within 15 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 16 (2d6+9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monster.spells: counterspell, detect magic, ice storm, stone shape, teleport

monster.name: Lifferlas
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 250

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their names and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."
Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."
Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Lifferlas makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Maegera the Dawn Titan
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 241

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
trait.text: Maegera's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Fire Aura
trait.text: At the start of each of Maegera's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it takes 35 (10d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 35 (10d6) fire damage from touching Maegera or from hitting it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Maegera moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Maegera are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to it.

trait.name: Fire Form
trait.text: Maegera can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: Maegera sheds bright light in a 120-foot radius and dim light for an additional 120 feet.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Maegera can innately cast fireball (spell save DC 19) at will, requiring no material components. Maegera's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Maegera has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Maegera makes three slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6+5) bludgeoning damage plus 35 (10d6) fire damage.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: Maegera can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only one legendary action at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Maegera regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Quench Magic
legendary.text: Maegera targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. Any resistance or immunity to fire damage that the target gains from a spell or a magic item is suppressed. This effect lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn.

legendary.name: Smoke Cloud (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Maegera exhales a billowing cloud of hot smoke and embers that fills a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area takes 11 (2d10) fire damage. The cloud lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn. Creatures completely within the cloud are blinded and can't be seen.

legendary.name: Create Fire Elemental (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Maegera's hit points are reduced by 50 as part of it separates and becomes a fire elemental with 102 hit points. The fire elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of Maegera and acts on Maegera's initiative count. Maegera can't use this action if it has 50 hit points or fewer. The fire elemental obeys Maegera's commands and fights until destroyed.

monster.spells: fireball

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 248

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Sheriff Markham of Bryn Shander is a brawny, likable man of few words. Nothing is more important to him than protecting Icewind Dale. He judges others by their actions, not their words.
Ideal: "All people deserve to be treated with dignity."
Bond: "Duvessa is a natural leader, but she needs help. That's my job."
Flaw: "I bury my emotions and have no interest in small talk."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Markham makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10+2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) piercing damage. Markham carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 251

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Innkeeper Mires is a retired carnival attraction, dubbed "the Yeti" because of his barrel-shaped body and the thick, white hair covering his arms, chest, back, and head. When Goldenfields suffers, so does his business, so he takes strides to protect the compound.
Ideal: "As does the Emerald Enclave, I believe that civilization and the wilderness need to learn to coexist."
Bond: "Make fun of me all you like, but don't speak ill of my inn or my employees!"
Flaw: "When something upsets me, I have a tendency to fly into a rage."

action.name: Bearhug
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13) and takes 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of Miros's turns until the grapple ends. Mires cannot make attacks while grappling a creature.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10) piercing damage. Miros carries ten crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 254

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On each of his turns, Narth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runs a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.
Ideal: "The bigger the risk, the greater the reward."
Bond: "I adore my colleague Alaestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her."
Flaw: "I'll risk life and limb to become a legend."

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.

monster.name: Naxene Drathkala

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 252

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Naxene is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence {spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
• 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
• 3rd level (3 slots): fly, lightning bolt

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Goldenfields' crops are vital to Waterdeep's survival, which is why the Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors sent Naxene to make sure the temple-farm is adequately defended. At first she regarded the task as a punishment, but now she appreciates the peace and quiet.
Ideal: "There's no problem that can't be solved with magic."
Bond: "I have great respect for Lady Laeral Silverhand of Waterdeep. She and the Lords' Alliance are going to bring some much-needed order to this lawless land."
Flaw: "I'm too smart to be wrong about anything."

action.name: Staff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.spells: fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, mage armor, magic missile, shield, misty step, suggestion, fly, lightning bolt

monster.name: Nimir
monster.resist: cold

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 256

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Nimir can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Nimir's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Nimir is an insightful, even-keeled storm giant who believes that a lasting alliance between giants and small folk can make the world a safer, more enlightened place. He believes King Hekaton was wise to choose Princess Serissa as his heir apparent, and it would never occur to him to question their orders.
Ideal: "It's the duty of the big to protect the small."
Bond: "I'd give my life to defend my king and his royal line."
Flaw: "I never question orders."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Nimir makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Nimir hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point he can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.spells: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, control weather, water breathing

monster.name: Oren Yogilvy
monster.resist: poison

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 252

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Oren can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Oren rolls a l on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Stout Resilience
trait.text: Oren has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Oren came to Northfurrow's End looking for easy work and found it. He sings for his supper, drinks like a fish, and wanders the fields at night dreaming up new lyrics to entertain the inn's other guests. Oren likes to stir up trouble from time to time, but he doesn't have a mean bone in his body.
Ideal: "Music is food for the soul."
Bond: "You had me at 'Can I buy you a drink?'"
Flaw: "I have a knack for putting myself in harm's way. Good thing I'm lucky!"

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage. Oren carries four daggers.

monster.name: Orlekto
monster.resist: cold

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 256

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Orlekto can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Orlekto's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Orlekto is in love with Princess Mirran and wants to see her become Queen of the lyrmskull Throne. (If Mirran is dead, Orlekto aims to avenge her.) If the opportunity to eliminate Hekaton or Serissa presents itself, Orlekto seizes it. Until then, he conceals his treacherous nature.
Ideal: "Storm giants should rule the world. Weak leaders have let dragons and others steal what the gods gave to us!"
Bond: "I serve Princess Mirran and her alone."
Flaw: "For Mirran's love or my revenge, I'd betray my king and my honor."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Orlekto makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Orlekto hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point he can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.spells: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, control weather, water breathing

monster.name: Othovir

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 255

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Othovir is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following sorcerer spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): blade ward, fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
• 1st level (3 slots): mage armor, thunderwave, witch bolt

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Othovir is a gifted harness-maker who doesn't talk about his family or where he came from. He cares about his business, his clients, and his good name.
Ideal: "Find what you do well, and do it to the best of your ability."
Bond: "I won't allow my name to be tarnished."
Flaw: "I get angry when others pry into my private life."

action.name: Rapier
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Othovir adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Othovir must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.spells: blade ward, fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation, mage armor, thunderwave, witch bolt

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 242

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The wormling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage, and if the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wormling. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns. If the wormling takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wormling must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wormling. If the worm ling dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tail Stinger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Shaldoor
monster.resist: cold

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 256

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Shaldoor can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Shaldoor's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: A skilled rider of rocs and whales, Shaldoor believes that Annam the All-Father shattered the ordning to push giants into war against the dragons. She is thrilled to be on the front lines in this great conflict!
Ideal: "Giants are made for war — storm giants most of all!"
Bond: "Ostoria is gone, yet I long for the return of a mighty giant empire."
Flaw: "I like to rain destruction down upon my enemies, and I never show them mercy."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Shaldoor makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Shaldoor hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point she can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.spells: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, control weather, water breathing

monster.name: Shalvus Martholio
monster.skill: Deception +4, Insight +4, Investigation +3, Perception +4, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 250

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: Shalvus deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Shalvus that isn't incapacitated and Shalvus doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Nalaskur Thaelond of Bargewright Inn has entrusted the shepherd Shalvus with an important assignment: to figure out the best way by which Goldenfields can be brought under the Black Network's control. Shalvus believes that success will ensure his swift rise through the Zhentarim ranks.
Ideal: "I'll do what it takes to prove myself to the Zhentarim."
Bond: "I love animals, and I'm very protective of them."
Flaw: "I can't resist taking risks to feed my ambitions."

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Beldora carries ten crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 249

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Baric has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: As a knight of the Order of the Gauntlet, Sir Baric has sworn oaths to catch evildoers and bring them to justice. His current quarry is a dwarf brigand, Worvil "the Weevil" Forkbeard, who is rumored to be hiding in Icewind Dale. In addition to his gear, Sir Baric has an unarmored warhorse, Henry.
Ideal: "Evil must not be allowed to thrive in this world."
Bond: "Tyr is my lord; the order, my family. Through my actions, I shall honor both."
Flaw: "I'm not afraid to die. When Tyr finally calls me, I'll go to him happily."

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10) piercing damage. Baric carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 247

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: An acolyte of Torm, Sirac grew up on the streets of Suzail, the capital of Cormyr. He came to Icewind Dale to become a knucklehead trout fisher but instead found religion. The misbegotten son of Artus Cimber, a renowned human adventurer, Sirac hasn't seen his father since he was a baby.
Ideal: "Without duty or loyalty, a man is nothing."
Bond: "Icewind Dale is where I belong for the rest of my life."
Flaw: "I am honest to a fault."

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Dart
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 3) piercing damage. Sirac carries six darts.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: Sirac adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Sirac must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 254

trait.name: Giant Slayer
trait.text: Any weapon attack that Urgala makes against a giant deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage on a hit.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: A retired adventurer, Urgala owns a respectable inn, the Northshield House, and she doesn't want to see it or her neighbors' homes destroyed. She has no tolerance for monsters or bullies.
Ideal: "We live in a violent world, and sometimes violence is necessary for survival."
Bond: "My home is my life. Threaten it, and I'll hurt you."
Flaw: "I know how treacherous and greedy adventurers can be. I don't trust them — any of them."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Urgala makes two attacks with her morningstar or her shortbow.

action.name: Morningstar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach S ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+1) piercing damage. Urgala carries a quiver of twenty arrows.

monster.name: Uthgardt Shaman

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 243

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The shaman can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 12; +4 to hit with spell attacks) with a sacred bundle:
At will: dancing lights, mage hand, message, thaumaturgy
1/day each: augury, bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, hex, prayer of healing, speak with dead, spirit guardians

trait.name: Tribal Spells
trait.text: Depending on an Uthgardt shaman's tribe, the shaman's Innate Spellcasting feature gains additional spells the shaman can cast once per day.
Black Lion: animate dead, chill touch, feign death, revivify
Black Raven: animal messenger (raven only) ,feather fall, polymorph (into a raven only)
Blue Bear: enhance ability (bear's endurance only), heroism
Elk: expeditious retreat, find steed (elk only), haste
Gray Wolf. beast sense (wolf or dire wolf only), moonbeam, speak with animals (wolf or dire wolf only)
Great Worm: crusader's mantle, divine favor, hypnotic pattern
Griffon: feather fall, fly
Sky Pony: divine favor, feather fall, lightning bolt
Red Tiger: beast sense (tiger only), enhance ability (cat's grace only),jump
Thunderbeast: enhance ability (bull's strength only), pass without trace, stoneskin
Tree Ghost: barkskin, druidcraft, plant growth, speak with plants

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

monster.spells: dancing lights, mage hand, message, thaumaturgy, augury, bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, hex, prayer of healing, speak with dead, spirit guardians

monster.name: Vaasha
monster.resist: cold

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 256

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: Vaasha can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Vaasha's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light
3/day each: control weather, water breathing

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Vaasha is a skilled hunter and tracker who doesn't charge into danger without first assessing the risks. She's not afraid to speak her mind, even to her king. To her, a worthy leader values the truth, no matter how painful it is.
Ideal: "I want this conflict over with so that I can return to the quiet stillness of the ocean depths."
Bond: "I'll protect this beautiful world from the ravages of evil with my dying breath."
Flaw: "I don't care if my words hurt others' feelings."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Vaasha makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12+9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Vaasha hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point she can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.spells: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, control weather, water breathing

monster.name: Yakfolk Priest

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 245

trait.name: Spellcaster
trait.text: The yakfolk is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). The yakfolk has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, cure wounds, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): augury, hold person, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, protection from energy, sending
• 4th level (1 slot): banishment

trait.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body drops to O hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body and is stunned until the end of its next turn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The yakfolk makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target: Hit: 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (2d8+3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Summon Earth Elemental (1/Day)
action.text: The yakfolk summons an earth elemental. The summoned elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and acts as an ally of the summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.spells: flight, mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, bane, command, cure wounds, sanctuary, augury, hold person, spiritual weapon, bestow curse, protection from energy, sending, banishment

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 244

trait.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body drops to O hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body and is stunned until the end of its next turn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The yakfolk makes two attacks, either with its greatsword or its longbow.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6+4) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Storm King's Thunder p. 251

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text: Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.
Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."
Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."
Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Zi makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8+1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Bryn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Bryn has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Stout Resilience
trait.text: Bryn has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Bryn is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Bryn has the following ranger spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

monster.spells: ensnaring strike, hunter's mark, longstrider

Cantrips (at will): chill touch, light, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness
• 2nd level (2 slots): misty step, ray of enfeeblement

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

monster.spells: chill touch, light, shocking grasp, detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness, misty step, ray of enfeeblement

monster.name: Illydia Maethellyn
monster.languages: Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Sylvan

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Sword Coast Legends NPCs

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Illydia is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Illydia has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, spare the dying
• 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, guiding bolt, identify, sanctuary
• 2nd level (2 slots): augury, lesser restoration, prayer of healing, suggestion

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Turn Undead (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: Illydia presents her holy symbol and speaks a prayer censuring the undead. Each undead that can see or hear her within 30 feet of her must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from Illydia as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of her. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

monster.spells: guidance, sacred flame, spare the dying, command, cure wounds, guiding bolt, identify, sanctuary, augury, lesser restoration, prayer of healing, suggestion

monster.name: Jarhild Stoneforge
monster.resist: poison

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Jarhild has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Jarhild's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Longsword
